room_title: Escape room "The Curious Case of Professor Hugh Manitee" by Escape Key in Roanoke
room_description:
If you want to write for me again, then I'm going to need you to prove yourself. Professor Hugh Manitee is the most reclusive professor on campus, and you're going to write a story on him. If you can get an interview with him, you deserve the job. If you can't, you'll have to get creative, but I'll remind you that I cannot condone sneaking in after hours. Security is hourly, so if you get caught, don't think your press pass will save you.
â€‹Bring me Manitee's story by midnight, and you've got the job. If you don't, don't bother showing up tomorrow morning.
